timeline.title: Product Launch
timeline.description: Successfully launched our flagship product to global markets with unprecedented reception.

timeline.title: Series B Funding
timeline.description: Secured $50M in Series B funding to accelerate growth and expand our team.

timeline.title: Global Expansion
timeline.description: Opened offices in 5 new countries, bringing our services to millions more users.

timeline.title: Innovation Award
timeline.description: Received the prestigious Tech Innovation Award for our groundbreaking platform.

timeline.title: Company Founded
timeline.description: Started our journey with a vision to transform the industry through technology.
